errors: Quote in C03 was not found verbatim in report: "Retrospective cohort of metastatic patients receiving ICI treatment, compared by prior SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccination status."
Invalid JSON: Bad control character in string literal in JSON at position 1139 (line 7 column 156)

critical_issues: The public_summary.json file is invalid JSON (unescaped newline in the "what_is_new" array), preventing any dependable summary extraction or downstream use.
Claim audit flags grounding invalid because an expected quote (report line 15) could not be located verbatim, so at least one claim summary lacks confirmed textual grounding.
value.summary: Most of the structured files accurately mirror the report’s datasets, quantitative findings, and limitations (lines 13‑57), but the public_summary.json cannot be parsed and the claim audit reported an ungrounded quote, so the suite is not currently faithful or practical for downstream review.
